lines: Multiple-stage recurrence reported across childhood and adulthood.
Third-party confirmations recorded without verified linkage.
Camp evacuated through internal breach; dispersal pattern inconsistent with controlled exit.
Cause remains unconfirmed; reconstruction of sequence incomplete.
Unidentified deceased subject; no registry match across available records.
Cipher-related material recovered; purpose and origin undetermined.
Distress transmission received; boarding resulted in total crew fatalities with no visible trauma.
Vessel destroyed before analysis; cause not verifiable.
Over-water visual event documented; non-reflective mass observed with irregular motion.
Secondary form detected only on later photographic review.
Route completion time inconsistent with recorded distance and expected waypoints.
Unregistered vehicle observed prior to discontinuity; post-event tracking failed.
Live call maintained for ~47 minutes during active navigation; location data remained inconsistent.
Final utterance followed by abrupt termination; no trace recovered thereafter.
